resources.string:
YouTube monitoring service used for analysis of user behavior.

 *For this service to work you have to enable accessibility mode in the YouTube app.

 *Service will quietly shutdown when the research is over.
double tap left or right to skip 10 seconds
1080p will apply to your current video
higher picture quality will apply to your current video
data saver will apply to your current video
1440p will apply to your current video
2160p will apply to your current video
720p will apply to your current video
480p will apply to your current video
360p will apply to your current video
240p will apply to your current video
144p will apply to your current video
Accessibility player, Display accessibility controls in the player, Off
Accessibility player, Display accessibility controls in the player, On
